title: The Queen's Head
text: Famous food, incredible live music and an abundance of events. This family run pub is a proper boozer, an amazing dining experience, a vegan destination, a full-on original live music venue… its truly unique. A pub that delivers on quality, service and value but is unpretentious, down-to-earth and not afraid to be different. Whether food, fun or rockin’ out we’ve got you covered.
